name: Heart's last exam (Gamejam version)
description:
This game was created for the DMSPILJAM September 2020.

Theme: "There is something wrong in Denmark"

Catagory: Youth

Please read the READ-ME for more details.

There might be updates in the future, or a proper final polished version.

FAQ:
Question: "If the game takes place in Denmark, and things are written in Danish, why are they speaking English?"

Answer: Simply to make the game more accessible
